climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: ECO-FRIENDLY CLEANING POWER: Concentrated powdered laundry soap works on all your laundry, from high-tech fabrics to delicates, washing away smells, stains, and left-behind residue from previous detergents.

HYPOALLERGENIC: Washing soda and powerful, natural ingredients work together to deep clean, rinse from fabrics completely, and leave nothing on your clothes. The fragrance-free formula is ideal for those with sensitive skin and will not cover stains or odors with artificial brighteners or perfumes. Our powder laundry detergent is safe for hand washing.
CLOTH DIAPER FRIENDLY: This detergent is safe to use on baby fabrics, effectively deep cleaning cloth diapers and other baby clothes between wears perfect along with your other baby essentials.

LESS IS MORE: Each bag contains just four ingredients and one tablespoon per dose. No suds, just a deep clean that leaves fabric fresh and soft and your washing machine cleaner by removing old laundry detergents left deep in your machine.

EPA SAFER CHOICE CERTIFIED: Charlie’s Soap laundry soap and our other sustainable products are certified safer for the environment and is septic safe. The eco-friendly formula helps remove fats, oils, greases, and odors from sewer lines, saving your town money and water making it the perfect laundry solution.
body.description: The secret to a happy life with clean clothes while doing your share for Mother Earth shouldn’t be complicated. Use our concentrated Laundry Powder detergent. It deep cleans your laundry for only pennies per wash and one tablespoon per large load, as it removes trapped odors and stains. When used as directed, Charlie's Soap is hypoallergenic and safer for the environment. Plus, it removes residues from your previous detergent. No need for fabric softener, either. Septic safe. With each wash, clothes washed in Charlie's Soap get cleaner and cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Charlie's Soap Laundry Powder is an absolute game-changer when it comes to laundry detergents. From its powerful cleaning capabilities to its eco-friendly and hypoallergenic formula, this product has truly exceeded my expectations.First and foremost, the effectiveness of Charlie's Soap Laundry Powder is remarkable. I've been amazed at how just a small scoop of this powder is enough to tackle even the toughest stains and odors on my clothes. It's saved me both time and money, as I no longer need to use excessive amounts of detergent to get my laundry clean.One of the standout features of this detergent is its commitment to simplicity. It's free from unnecessary additives like dyes and fragrances, making it a fantastic choice for my family, which includes individuals with sensitive skin. I've noticed a significant reduction in skin irritations and allergic reactions since switching to Charlie's Soap.The fact that this detergent is suitable for both high-efficiency and standard washing machines is a huge convenience. I don't have to worry about using different detergents for different machines, which makes laundry day much smoother.Moreover, I appreciate Charlie's Soap's dedication to environmental sustainability. The biodegradable formula aligns with my values, and the recyclable packaging is a thoughtful touch that contributes to reducing waste.The powder's ability to effectively clean clothes without leaving a residue is something I truly value. I've experienced instances where other detergents leave behind a soapy film, but Charlie's Soap rinses out completely, leaving my laundry feeling fresh and clean.In conclusion, Charlie's Soap Laundry Powder has become a staple in my household for all the right reasons. Its cleaning power, hypoallergenic formula, versatility, and commitment to the environment make it a top-notch choice. If you're looking for a laundry detergent that delivers outstanding results while being gentle on your skin and the planet, Charlie's Soap Laundry Powder is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets Tough Clothes Clean! Highly Recommend!
reviews.reviewText: This laundry soap is very well-made, and gets the job done very well. I am very impressed with it, as I can simply throw all my clothes in with it, and it gets out whatever stains and everything that's on there. Would highly recommend, even just to try. It does not have a scent, but my clothes still smell good somehow.Thanks,B. W.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans great and hypoallergenic!
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to try Charlie’s after having used Tide free for so many years, but we wanted to switch to something safe for our daughter’s sensitive skin. It took a few washings to get used to the feeling of the cleaner clothes, and the fact the clothes had almost no scent. It really does work great though. Sometime I do have to do a spot treatment but it’s not anymore often than I would have to do it with Tide. We tried Molly’s first and it also worked pretty well, but had some issues dissolving. Pro tip: put the powder in the bottom of the washer and not on top of the clothes or it will sometimes leave a residue. Overall great product we’ve been using for about 3 years now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for pet households
reviews.reviewText: I do a LOT of laundry because I have a lot of cats. I wash their beds, the litter box pads, and the things that inevitably get peed on. I was apprehensive about trying Charlie's because of the tiny amount used per load, but it really works!! No odor AT ALL and the urine stains on the white litter pads are completely gone. And it works great on my regular laundry as well.I have not noticed any residue, everything gets clean, and I appreciate the lack of scent. This stuff is fabulous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this detergent!
reviews.reviewText: No more lugging heavy bags/boxes/bottles of laundry detergent! My bag lasts 4 months and cleans really well using 1 T. of soap. Really. It is safe, gentle and very effective. Best washing soap I have ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Much better than other common laundry detergents
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this since I had my first baby. Overall, it is good, no smell, clean, and no allergic reactions. I dropped one star because some residue still did not feel good on my hand when I transferred it to the dryer, even though I used an extra rinse cycle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best laundry detergent EVER!
reviews.reviewText: Just a little scoop takes care of the clothes, no perfume, no dyes and it is a powder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best laundry soap
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a new laundry soap one day at the store and was reading a small packet of this. Going back and forth I ended up putting it down as it seemed a little more than I wanted to spend to try something. Then a lady walked by and said, I know I don’t know you but I wanted to say I saw you looking at that soap and I love it! So I decided to try it… she was right… it was amazing! This is the 3rd bag I have purchased now and by the biggest bag! It lasts FOREVER and does an amazing job! I added some essential oil for smell in the dryer with my dryer balls and absolutely and thrilled I did try it!!!
